afest.datastructures.tree.decision.interfaces

Interface ITrainingPoint<R extends java.io.Serializable,T extends java.io.Serializable>

  • Type Parameters:
    R - Type used to identify features.
    T - Type object attached to the point.
    All Superinterfaces:
    IPoint<R>, java.io.Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ERTMemoryLessTrainingPoint, ERTTrainingPoint

    public interface ITrainingPoint<R extends java.io.Serializable,T extends java.io.Serializable>
extends IPoint<R>
